name: invoice-dapp-monorepo
description: Modern Invoice Management DApp - Ethereum, React, Node.js
author: ahmetsagdasli

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-contracts && npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run contracts" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
